title: Value-Based Creative Pedagogical Design for Inclusive and Sustainable STEM Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational STEM concepts and verbal communication skills
context.additional_context: Involves learners from diverse cultural backgrounds, emphasizing activities based on everyday materials and local cultural contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can design STEM learning activities that reflect playfulness and frugality.
Learners can propose inclusive education models considering cultural diversity and resource constraints.
Learners build a language-based STEM project portfolio that promotes sustainability and social resilience.

resources: Regionally Culturally Relevant Resources (Traditional Crafts, Natural Materials, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
